entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json Source Generator no code generated for Deserialize? #78602
  • Chrome Debugger Tests timeout #78599
  • Support immutable collections (System.Collections.Immutable) in options binding (ConfigurationBinder) #78592
  • Iterating large queue throws exception #78590
  • [Analyzer] Use IndexOfAnyValues instead of inlined or cached array #78587
    8.0.0
  • SslStream.ReadAsyncInternal() throws misleading exception if stream is disposed while reading #78586
    8.0.0
  • Test failure global::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Fma_Vector256.Program.MultiplySubtractSingle() #78584
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [Question:] GC event notification for Memory-Compaction/Compression inside an array! #78585
  • .NET 7 extremely high memory usage #78481
  • Local test run fails to analyze HardwareIntrinsics test results #78462
  • DI: Hangs instead of throwing exception on circular dependency #78327
    Future
  • [gcstress0x3-gcsttress0xc] Interop/COM/ComWrappers/WeakReference/WeakReferenceTest/WeakReferenceTest fails #77976
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in ilconformance jmp #78579
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline (`dotnet-runtime-perf`) completely broken for `main` #78575
    8.0.0
  • Reusing RC2 CryptoDecryptor with the combination of DeflateStream causes invalid reads starting from net6. #78569

PullRequests

Created

  • Pod Updates November 2022 #78603
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Check field's real type before we call getArrayOrStringLength #78601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix arithmetic overflow in Queue<T>'s MoveNext() #78600
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SPMI: Avoid duplicate key lookups on replay #78597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Remove an assertion. #78596
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SPMI: Implement fallback schema layout #78594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold "cns"[cns] for ROS<char> #78593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid allocations in SendTo and Quic #78591
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add check for ALC in native hosting tests #78588
    area-Host

Merged

  • Fix the name/assembly of XmlWriterInlineDataDiscoverer. #78595
    area-System.Xml
  • Implement abstraction for marshalling direction in the generator APIs #78196
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Change IMarshallingGenerator.AsNativeType to return ManagedTypeInfo instead of TypeSyntax #78195
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use a list for tests in src/tests/run.py #78463
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fixing missing GC.KeepAlive in ComWrappers WeakReference test #78589
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix jmp.il after #78501 #78582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove invalidation of whitespace in TryGetNextExtendedAttribute #78465
    area-System.IO
  • Pod Updates November 2022 #78578
    area-Meta

Updated

  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change the default SuperPMI collection location #78513
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 #78247
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • update System.CommandLine and adopt to breaking changes #78577
    area-System.Console
  • Replace MD5 with MurmurHash3_128 in SPMI #78527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    NO-MERGE, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] More jiterpreter cleanup #78519
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: artifacts\bin\coreclr\windows.x64.Debug\IL and System.Private.CoreLib.dll #2097

PullRequests

Created

  • Expand support for indirections #2098

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero-init locals on the shadow stack, simplify lowering code, allow STRUCT-typed PHIs #2096
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • VS 17.4.1 .NET Maui Blazor NU1012 NETSDK1045 #29116

Updated

  • Missing Linux `TargetFrameworkMoniker` #27061
    Discussion
  • dotnet workload install always displays "The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart." #28993

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29132
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2048853 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ref safety errors reported for deconstruction assignment with discard #65522
  • List pattern indexable requirement binds to this[object] indexer #65521
  • Compiler treats `string?` as `string` #65520
  • Document outline not showing all members vb #65519
  • `Inline temporary variable` adds unnecessary cast and introduces warning #65517
  • CS0452 and CS0718 error sometimes reported on unintuitive locations #65515

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove cast of string literal to string #65518
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update to latest version of protocol with new pull diagnostic types #65514
    Area-IDE
  • Fix MEF composition used for the LSIF generator #65512
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65513
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not import the VSWorkspace during Roslyn package initialization #65492
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65510
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65524
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #65523
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • Add experimental formatting option to control placement of `=>` #65476
    Area-IDE
  • Improve consistency in our parser code. #65508
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value due to interpolated string handler rewrite #65505
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [OIDC] - Failed to authenticate - Regression after upgrading to .NET 7 #45187
  • Blazor Custom Element with ChildContent and Parameters #45183
  • Make QuickGrid more inheritance friendly #45182
  • Create a field for @ref like x:Name in xaml #45181
  • EndpointMiddleware should not catch exceptions #45180
  • TypeLoadException in WASM with Covariance #45179

Closed

  • GenerateClaimsAsync method in UserClaimsPrincipalFactory getting called after every 30 minutes in Blazor Server #45147

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for comment syntax to route detector #45185
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

Updated

  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2049247 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Added configureConnection delegate to CircuitStartOptions #44623
    area-blazor
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttrbute syntaxes #44663
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Change X-Requested-With header to "Fetch" in FetchHttpClient #44921
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22562.2 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • gRPC JSON transcoding - msbuild includes proto dependencies #44999
    area-grpc
  • Add OnPrepareResponseAsync #45062
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45121
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3: Throw AddressInUseException for used port in the same process #45144
    area-runtime
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-runtime
  • [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45169
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • [Api Controllers] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45173
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Navigation GoToAsync exception on iOS #11503
  • SVG Image loaded with ImageSource.FromStream() not displayed #11502
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException after MainPage swap #11501
  • Cant find toolbar as shown in the tutorial of .NET MAUI #11500
  • Opacity set in xaml becomes the maximum value during animation #11499
  • OnAppearing not called if returning from a modal page to a modal page #11498
  • Text is clipped in SwipItem #11495
  • Horizontal Center Alignment on Grid elements inside CollectionView.Header does not work #11494

Closed

  • Cant find toolbar as shown in the tutorial #11496
  • AddAppAction icons don't work with MauiImages in the Resources/Images folder on Android #9234
    .NET 8 Planning
  • App crash when recover run android app from device desktop #11277
  • No ios simulator in Visual Studio Mac #11305
  • Warning NU1603 received in File New Maui 7.0 RC2 App #11042

PullRequests

Created

  • Using local function to fix multi-thread issues #11497
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Set window soft input via window mapper #11489
  • [net7.0] Fix the ordering registration for tests #11492

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EfCore: How to use override Equals Model Compare #29625
  • Look into SQL Server 2022 IS DISTINCT FROM #29624
  • SQL Server: Make HasIndex work on JSON properties #29623
  • Find many objects by key - The right way? #29621
  • Make collation part of type mapping #29620
    Backlog
  • Cannot access property through interface in ExecuteUpdate setter lambda #29618

Closed

  • Discriminator is always filled with a default value when it is (or part of) the primary key AND a shadow field #29605
  • Lazy building of internal runtime model #29561
  • JSON/Query: improve de-duplication logic for collection element access scenarios #29606
  • ValueGenerated and ValueGeneratedSensitive have property/entity type swapped in message #29517
    8.0.0
  • HasConversion is not used in the provider value comparer #29406
    8.0.0
  • Reexamine the requirement for unique index (and key?) CLR types to be comparable #28566
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • C# modernization/cleanup in database model factories #29622
  • Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29619

Merged

  • Fix passing property and entity type names to ValueGenerated messages #29609
  • Fix value generation with converter between different numeric types #29601

Updated

  • Fix to #28881 - Consider removing unnecessary CASTs around JSON_VALUE #29417
  • Modernize type checking in model differ #28381
  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422
  • Reverse engineering of Dynamics CRM TDS endpoint and Synapse Serverless SQL Pool #29122
  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518
